relation: Bring back chat style and emoticon selection via knewstuff2
Updated contact list interface (uses Qt 4 rather than Qt 3)
Update Kopete to better support Decibel
Setup libbtcore from KTorrent in KGet (to avoid dependency to extragear)
Extend the TransferHistory to use SQLite and XML-Backends and display the information inside a kcategorizedview
Decibel, a framework for real time communication services. Move from playground/pim
Optional system tray icon (with quick access to bookmarks)
Improved behavior of entering special keys for better workflow
Zeroconf support (detecting remote desktop services in local network)
Bookmark dock widget for quick access to bookmars, zero conf detected services and recently used connections
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Schedules/KDE4/4.1 Feature Plan" - KDE TechBase
